issue.title: Mesh is invisible, but I can see it as a collision. DAE model

content.raw: I see, maybe it's different from the original issue. The SDF file looksok. If your mesh is public, it would be helpful to look at it. There could be something in the collada mesh which was parsed one way in Gazebo 7 and another way on Gazebo 9.
content.html: I see, maybe it's different from the original issue. The SDF file looksok. If your mesh is public, it would be helpful to look at it. There could be something in the collada mesh which was parsed one way in Gazebo 7 and another way on Gazebo 9.
